definitions.title: vb. hew, hew down or off
definitions.body: (NH id. (rare), Aram. [[גְּדַע]] Ithp.; Ar. jada9a cut off hand or other member, mutilate)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[גׇּדַע]] La 2:3; [[וְגׇדַעְתִּ֫י]] 1Sa 2:31; Impf. [[וׇאָגְדַּע]] Zec 11:10, Zec 11:14; Pt. pass. [[גְּדוּעָה]] Is 15:2 (so many edd. but) Baer [[גְּרוּעָה]]; cf. infr., [[גְּדֻעִים]] Is 10:33; —hew, cut in two, a staff Zec 11:10, Zec 11:14; metaph. hew off, an arm 1Sa 2:31; horns La 2:3; hew down, trees Is 10:33; if in Is 15:2 then = shave off (object [[זקן]], beard), but no other indication of this meaning, and true MT [[גְּרוּעָה]], cf. Baer's note & Je 48:37; v. [[גרע]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִגְדַּע]] Ju Jdg 21:6 [[נֶגְדַּע]] Je 50:23; 3 fs. [[נִגְדְּעָה]] Je 48:25; [[וְנִגְדְּעָה]] consec. Is 22:25; 2 ms. [[נִגְדַּעְתָּ]] Is 14:12; 3 pl. [[וְנִגְדְּעוּ]] consec. Ez Eze 6:6, Am 3:14; —be hewn off, of altar-horns Am 3:14, of idols Ez Eze 6:6 (‖[[נשׁבר]]); of severance of a tribe from nation Ju Jdg 21:6; fig. of king of Babylon Is 14:12; of Babylon as hammer Je 50:23 (‖[[נשׁבר]]); of a minister, under fig. of secure peg or pin Is 22:25; of horn of Moab Je 48:25 (‖[[נשׁבר]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גִּדַּע]] 2Ch 34:7, [[גִּדֵָּעַ]] 2Ch 34:4, Ps 107:16, [[וַיְגַדַּע]] 2Ch 14:2, [[אֲגַדֵָּעַ]] Ps 7:5, Is 45:2, [[וַיְגַדְּעוּ]] 2Ch 31:1; 3 mpl. [[תְּגַדֵּעָוּן]] De 7:5, De 12:3; —hew off, down, in two (cf. Qal) of Asherîm De 7:5, 2Ch 14:2, 2Ch 31:1, of idols De 12:3 ([[פְּסִילִים]]) 2Ch 34:4, 2Ch 34:7 ([[חַמָּנִים]]); fig. horns of wicked Ps 75:11; bars of iron (i.e. of Babylon's gates) Is 45:2, cf. Ps 107:16. †
